document.full_text: u.s. meat producer tyson foods inc's  second-quarter revenue rose more than expected on higher prices and the company forecast full year sales that would top wall street expectations.
document.title: tyson foods sees higher prices lifting 2011 sales
lines_and_colors: u.s. meat producer tyson foods inc's  second-quarter revenue rose more than expected on higher prices and the company forecast full year sales that would top wall street expectations.
